pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, September 25, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, September 25, 2016:

Vancouver, British Columbia

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and Mrs. Grégoire Trudeau will accompany Their Royal Highnesses, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge, on a tour of the Immigrant Services Society’s new Welcome Centre in Vancouver.

Immigration Services Society
2610 Victoria Drive
Vancouver, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for arrivals
  • Only media accredited for the Royal Tour of Canada of Their Royal Highnesses will have access
  • Pooled coverage of the event


2:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a Canadian youth reception and will deliver remarks. Ms. Grégoire Trudeau and Their Royal Highnesses, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge, will be in attendance.

Telus Gardens
510 West Georgia Street
Vancouver, British Columbia

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage


3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister, Ms. Grégoire Trudeau and Their Royal Highnesses, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge, will visit Kitsilano Coast Guard Station for a first responders showcase.

Kitsilano Coast Guard Centre
1661 Whyte Avenue
Vancouver, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage for indoor program
  • Open coverage for outdoor program
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.
  • Only media accredited for the Royal Tour of Canada of Their Royal Highnesses will have access


Please note: all times are local


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
